Class Library

java.lang.Object
Library
public class Library extends Object
Represents a library containing books, authors, and patrons.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Library(ArrayList<Book> books, ArrayList<Patron> patrons, ArrayList<Author> authors)
    Initializes the Library object with specified lists of books, patrons, and authors.

    • Library

      public Library(ArrayList<Book> books, ArrayList<Patron> patrons, ArrayList<Author> authors)
      Initializes the Library object with specified lists of books, patrons, and authors.
      Parameters:
      books - List of books in the library.
      patrons - List of patrons of the library.
      authors - List of authors whose books are available in the library.

      Retrieves the list of books in the library.
      Returns:

      Returns:
      ArrayList containing the patrons of the library.

      Retrieves the list of authors whose books are available in the library.
      Returns:

    • searchByTitle

      public ArrayList<Book> searchByTitle(String title)
      Searches for books in the library by title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing the books with matching titles.

    • searchByAuthor

      public ArrayList<Book> searchByAuthor(String authorName)
      Searches for books in the library by author's name.
      Parameters:
      authorName - The name of the author whose books to search for.
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing the books written by the specified author.

    • searchByISBN

      public Book searchByISBN(long ISBN)
      Searches for a book in the library by its ISBN.
      Parameters:
      ISBN - The ISBN of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      The book with the specified ISBN if found, otherwise null.

    • borrowBook

      public void borrowBook(Patron patron, Book book, String searchType, String searchTerm, int numCopies)
      Allows a patron to borrow a book from the library based on the specified search criteria.
      Parameters:
      patron - The patron borrowing the book.
      book - The book to be borrowed.
      searchType - The type of search criteria (title, author, ISBN).
      searchTerm - The search term used to find the book.
      numCopies - The number of copies to be borrowed.

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook(Patron patron, Book book, String searchType, String searchTerm, int numCopies)
      Allows a patron to return a borrowed book to the library based on the specified search criteria.
      Parameters:
      patron - The patron returning the book.
      book - The book to be returned.
      searchType - The type of search criteria (title, author, ISBN).
      searchTerm - The search term used to find the book.
      numCopies - The number of copies to be returned.
